welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Tiptree, a charming village known for its delicious jam and beautiful countryside. We hope you enjoy your stay and take some time to explore all that this quaint town has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Wethersfield Airport offers a variety of services and amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Wethersfield Airport handles all freight and cargo operations for the airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Southend Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Terminal 2 is a smaller terminal used for low-cost airlines and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Stansted Airport handles both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Satellite Terminal
terminals.description: The satellite terminal at Stansted Airport is used for low-cost airlines and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
